About Me

BIO

I am soon to be a master of science in industrial engineering and management, a public health nurse, and a mother of two. I also have a deep passion for coding.

Career background

From Leading Sales to Helthcare Expertise

I began my career in fashion retail, where I excelled as the top salesperson at a flagship store in Helsinki, showcasing my abilities in customer service, sales, and communication. Driven by a desire to make a broader impact, I transitioned to healthcare and trained as a public health nurse. This role allowed me to develop a strong foundation in patient care, empathy, and attention to detail.

Master of Science

Industrial Engineering and Management

Currently, I am on the verge of completing my studies to become a Master of Science in Industrial Engineering and Management, specializing in digital production economics. This academic journey has equipped me with a solid understanding of business processes, operational efficiency, and strategic management.

Software Engineering Minor Studies

A Passion for Coding

In addition to my primary studies, I have discovered a deep enthusiasm for software engineering, which has become my minor. Coding has become a passion, and I find immense satisfaction in developing innovative solutions and working on software projects. From 'My Works' paige you can find some of my works.
